ygData.subject: Need to find Diamond Dust!! Plz Help!
ygData.msgSnippet: Where is Diamond Dust found? i am stuck at 102 skill and find it hard to believe that the aqua lung is the next step up from probes. i also attempted a lung at
ygData.messageBody:
Where is Diamond Dust found? i am stuck at 102 skill and find it hard to
believe that the aqua lung is the next step up from probes. i also attempted
a lung at skill 102...failed.
somoe else posted that they believe the gem cutter is the next step
item..and i must say i agree with this, if only we could find the diamond
dust...
so please, anyone who might know this information, please post it here so
that your fellow gnomes can trudge on through the skill in the hopes of one
day tinkering a rebreather that is "trivial." thx.
-Ranth Rathan, Master Tinkerer
